text: Marek Małecki (born 6 February 1938) is a Polish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Poland Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lviv Category:People from Lwów Voivodeship
title: Marek Małecki
